widget.label: Replace Your Password
widget.tooltip: Enter a new password twice and click Save.
widget.help: You get here after you followed the link sent to you in your email because you said you forgot your password. We ask you to change your password at this time and then click Save. At that point the system will log you in and you'll be able to visit our website.

widget.label: Password
widget.tooltip: Enter a new password. Do not forget that you are expected to use a different password on each website where you create an account.
widget.help: Enter a password that you will use with your Snap! website activities. Note that it is suggested that you never use the same password on more than one website so this password should be unique. Any character can be used in your password and it can be as long as 256 characters.

widget.label: Confirm Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your Snap! password again to make sure you did not mistype it.
widget.help: This box requires you to re-enter your Snap! password in order to make sure you typed it properly.

widget.label: Save
widget.tooltip: Once you entered your new password twice click here to save it.
widget.help: Please enter your new password twice before clicking on the Save button. Note that afterward you can edit your account information at any time.

widget.label: Log In
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the log in page
widget.help: You already have an account? Click this link to go to the log in page instead.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the home page.
